DOC.detailed_description: This parallel , double-blind , randomize , placebo control trial determine effect synbiotic formulation ( ProSynbiotic ) contain 4 billion CFU probiotic blend Bifidobacterium lactis BB-12 , Lactobacillus acidophilus LA-5 , Lactobacillus casei 431 Saccharomyces boulardii , along 1 g prebiotic inulin 100 mg galactooligosaccharide ( GOS ) gut microbiota composition , body composition , expression gene mediate dietary energy harvest adiposity , adiposity-related metabolic marker healthy free-living overweight moderately obese subject . The duration study 18 week , include 2-week run-in period randomization subject synbiotic placebo group , 12-week intervention period , 4-week follow-up end intervention . During intervention period , subject instructed take 3 capsule either synbiotic placebo per day maintain habitual diet physical activity . They also ask document unusual symptom side effect well keep bowel diary . Diet physical activity monitor via 24-h dietary recall global physical activity questionnaire respectively . Changes gut microbiota composition determine measure bacterial population level stool sample collected baseline , 6 week , 12 week follow time point . Body composition measure use BOD POD baseline , 6 week , 12 week . Gene expression level assess baseline 12 week colonocytes ( isolated stool sample ) PBMCs ( isolate blood sample ) qPCR . Metabolic marker measure baseline 12-weeks plasma serum use respective biochemical- immuno-assays .
